name: Daily Gangster
tag_list: daily-deals, marketing, events, books, software, webinars, training-programs, marketing-tools, discounts, how-to, business-tools
overview:
The Daily Gangster, a daily deals site that offers marketers, small business owners, authors and entrepreneurs a platform to shop for the marketing, social media and mobile programs they need.

The Daily Gangster focuses on how-to training programs, marketing tools, software, books, webinars and live events. Deep discounts are available daily ranging from 50 to 90% off on known brands, New York Times bestselling authors, respected experts and high quality programs.

The Daily Gangster platform is the creation of co-founder Dan Hollings, the marketing strategist associated with the 2007 mega-million dollar viral and social media phenomena known as “The Secret” which was featured on Oprah, Larry King and most mass media outlets.

In addition to the daily deals (or heists as they are called), the site offers a unique twist: a tongue-in-cheek gangster theme that would make James Cagney, Humphrey Bogart or even Al Capone feel at home.

Though most heists are very specifically focused on marketing programs, tools and events for business, there is a monthly “Gangsters for Charity” day where 100% of all proceeds are donated to charity. On this special day, almost any product might be featured as the heist of the day.

Vendors, merchants, authors, software developers and product creators may submit their products or programs to be featured if they meet the requirements stated at the site.

external_links.title: What if Al Capone ran a Daily Deals site?
